artist: Painter: After David Teniers, the Younger; Engraver: Jean Baptiste Mauzaisse; Lithographer: Villain
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image in black: Mauzaisse / DAVID TENIERS LE JEUNE. / d' apres son portrait peint par liu-meme / Lith de Villain  on souscrit rue Cassette, No.16  | on sheet in pencil: 2-459
title: Portrait of David Teniers, the Younger
